statements: SELECT * FROM landing_pages ORDER BY page_name DESC;
SELECT page_name, clicks, conversions FROM landing_pages WHERE traffic_source = 'Organic' ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT id, variation_group, conversion_rate FROM landing_pages WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY clicks ASC;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages WHERE variation_group = 2;
SELECT page_name, traffic_source, conversions FROM landing_pages WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages WHERE traffic_source = 'Google' ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT page_name, conversion_rate FROM landing_pages WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT id, page_name, traffic_source FROM landing_pages WHERE variation_group = 2 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages WHERE traffic_source IN ('Facebook', 'Instagram') ORDER BY clicks ASC, conversions ASC;
SELECT page_name, conversions FROM landing_pages WHERE clicks > 50 AND conversion_rate >= 2.5 ORDER BY conversions DESC, clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages;
SELECT page_title, url FROM landing_pages;
SELECT landing_page_id, page_title, url FROM landing_pages WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT test_id, test_date, clicks FROM test_results ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT landing_page_id, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM test_results WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages;
SELECT landing_page_id, url, conversion_rate FROM landing_pages WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT test_id, test_date, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM test_results ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT page_title, conversions FROM landing_pages WHERE landing_page_id = 1;
SELECT url, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM landing_pages JOIN test_results ON landing_pages.landing_page_id = test_results.landing_page_id GROUP BY url HAVING total_revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages;
SELECT page_name, clicks, conversions FROM landing_pages ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT variant_name, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_results WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ppc_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT page_name, variant_name, clicks, conversions FROM landing_pages JOIN campaign_results ON landing_pages.page_id = campaign_results.page_id;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages WHERE conversions > 10;
SELECT page_name, clicks FROM landing_pages ORDER BY clicks DESC, conversions ASC;
SELECT page_name, variant_name, campaign_name, clicks FROM landing_pages WHERE clicks BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND conversions < 20;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM ppc_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM campaign_results WHERE revenue > 1000 AND clicks > 500 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages;
SELECT variant_name, traffic_share FROM variants ORDER BY variant_id DESC;
SELECT landing_id, url, variant_id FROM landing_pages WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT campaign_name, spend, start_date FROM ppc_campaigns WHERE spend > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT clicks, conversions FROM test_results WHERE clicks > 50 AND conversions > 10;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages WHERE variant_id = 1 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT url, conversion_rate FROM landing_pages WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT landing_id, variant_id, clicks, conversions FROM test_results WHERE conversions > 10 AND clicks > 100 ORDER BY conversions DESC, clicks DESC;
SELECT ppc_id, campaign_name, spend FROM ppc_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY spend DESC;
SELECT variant_name, traffic_share FROM variants WHERE traffic_share BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY traffic_share ASC;
SELECT * FROM landing_pages;
SELECT landing_page_id, page_url, experiment_id FROM landing_pages WHERE experiment_id > 100;
SELECT experiment_id, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE hypothesis LIKE 'A%';
SELECT landing_page_id, clicks, conversions FROM experiment_results ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM landing_pages WHERE conversion_rate > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT landing_page_id, page_url, conversion_rate FROM landing_pages WHERE experiment_id = 3 AND page_url LIKE '%homepage%';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.email = 'example@email.com';
